tokens.resolved_gloss: literally one officiating, a priest; also (by courtesy) an acting priest (although a layman)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to spill forth (blood, a libation, liquid metal; or even a solid, i.e. to mound up); also (figuratively) to expend (life, soul, complaint, money, etc.); intensively, to sprawl out

tokens.resolved_gloss: blood (as that which when shed causes death) of man or an animal; by analogy, the juice of the grape; figuratively (especially in the plural) bloodshed (i.e. drops of blood)
